text: (And for every nation) for the adherents of each religion (there is a messenger) who calls them to Allah and to His religion. (And when their messenger cometh) to them and they deny (it will be judged between them) and the Messenger (fairly) with justice: those people will perish and the Messenger will be saved, (and they will not be wronged) their good works will not be decreased nor will their evil deeds be increased.
